Aleksandra T. Ma

Technology. Music. Life.

Princeton // New York

Hello! Nice to meet you :) My name is Aleksandra, or Sandra for short.

I graduated from UC Berkeley Statistics & Data Science in 2020 Now I’m a consultant at Deloitte, where I build and manage a data analytics engine for a global suscription streaming service client with my awesome teammates.

I often contemplate on what it means to be human, so most of what I do outside of work is centered around it. I enjoy exploring new technology that enhances the human experience. I love music (I know, who doesn’t?) I was classically trained in piano and have been teaching myself how to mix music. I take pictures of people, from my friends to strangers. I write occasionally too.

I have a tuxedo kitty named Poncho.
